meanings.sent1: The children were hyperexcited for the school field trip.
meanings.sent2: She was hyperexcited to receive her birthday present.
meanings.sent3: The hyperexcited puppy wagged its tail nonstop.
meanings.sent4: The hyperexcited fans cheered loudly at the concert.
meanings.sent5: His hyperexcited laughter filled the room with joy.

meanings.definition: To cause to be very excited or enthusiastic.
meanings.sent1: The surprise announcement hyperexcited the audience.
meanings.sent2: The news of the victory hyperexcited the team members.
meanings.sent3: The magician's tricks hyperexcited the crowd with wonder.
meanings.sent4: The upcoming event hyperexcited the entire community.
meanings.sent5: Her speech hyperexcited the students to take action.
